website_summaries.verdict: The Seaside Villa is surprisingly spacious and sturdy, and its molded sink, bench, and swinging door make playing house an immersive experience for little kids.
pros: Wide-open design makes it easy to monitor playtime

customer_reviews.title: Adorable playhouse
customer_reviews.text: We’ve purchased multiple items from Step2, and like those past purchases, this one is definitely a hit! My kids (ages 5 and 4) LOVE playing house. They squealed and jumped with joy when we surprised them with this sweet little house. The directions were easy to follow and we were able to assemble it in under an hour. The simple styling and soft colors made this an easy purchase for me, as i’m not a fan of the bright, tacky colors. Thank you Step2 for a high-quality toy, that doesn’t make a dent in my wallet! My kids, and their friends, will no doubt be spending many hours playing in this adorable house!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This house was great! Easy to build with the step by step instructions and all the parts are right there. Fun for my little guy and nephews to play in. Even with the age difference they all enjoyed the Villa! Easy to move from inside to outside for all the more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this playhouse for my grandchildren, ages 2 and 4. They love playing in it very much. It is nicely made and not too hard to put together. It is not a huge playhouse but just big enough. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Wood

customer_reviews.title: Use a drill to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Really cute house. Make sure to use a drill as the screw holes are only dimples in the plastic and not fully cut. I wish it had more features. My kids got bored in it fairly quickly and they LOVE playhouses. We bought it to keep inside and I like that they can get in through the open side or the door (or dog door) and I can see through it. It’s a bit plain but it was the most affordable one I could find. The only thing was that the step 2 sign fell off right away. Otherwise it’s held up fine and only took about 30 minutes to assemble with a drill.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Nesham

customer_reviews.title: This playhouse is just adorable! For the price and size
customer_reviews.text: This playhouse is just adorable! For the price and size, it lacks no functions or features. The modern look is very classy and looks nice in the backyard. With the size of this, it will also fit well inside our basement for the winter. The colors on this are neutral and trendy! I just love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Took my husband a couple of hours. Was easy. My grandbaby loves it.lets her play and use her imagination. If she has a little brother it will be great too since it's not pink. Going to be lots of fun all year. We have a sandbox next to it, so she is all set. It's on our patio so I did not want something very large. It's perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Terriermom

customer_reviews.title: Should hold up reasonable well. Sturdy enough for my 1 yearold granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Very little to dislike. Fun for the child and parent (or grandparent) alike. During these indoor-only times, this toy will bring weeks (months?) of entertainment for the young ones. Make sure you have ample space as it isn't all that small.
customer_reviews.author: A J Saveriano

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor purchase
customer_reviews.text: I adore this outdoor house. The joy on my child’s face after putting it together made all the work worth it. You definitely need a drill to put it together. There are a number of pieces but it’s not too cumbersome. I was able to do it in under an hour. My 16M old loves opening and closing the door and my dog loves the doggy door. It was exactly what we needed in our sunny backyard.
customer_reviews.author: JenCic

customer_reviews.title: Great house! Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this! I like the colors because it matches the rest of my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Barron

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun for baby
customer_reviews.text: A little tough to assemble especially the roof but one year old loves it. He goes in out the front door over and over. He stands at the sink, it’s like his little house. Him and the cat hang out inside when cat is in a good mood. Great independent play toy.
customer_reviews.author: Cdubs

customer_reviews.title: Great and fun product
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. Easy to put together. I didnt realize that you screw it together. Now I see why, because my 4 kids are rough and tumble. It's been almost 6 months and its holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph Berg

customer_reviews.title: it fits two toddlers 4 and 6
customer_reviews.text: After researching for months to make sure I get my money worth, i decided to get this one. It took two to put it together for about 30 min and the power drill is much quicker to use than the screwdriver. The kids love it, it looks small but it actually big enough for my almost 6 year old (40lbs) 4 year old(bday present) (30lbs) plus two chairs!!!. I am five foot five and my husband is almost 6 ft tall and we can fit in(not together lol). Hope this review helps to get a picture of how roomy it is inside.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Bradley

customer_reviews.title: My girls love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was easily able to put this together by himself before our daughters got back from school. They love it and play with it often! It's a great size for 2 little girls to play together and it moves easily so we can put it on the patio or the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Marie J.

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for 2 toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I chose this playhouse because it has the low bar side so our 1 year old can pull herself up to stand, and so there are multiple exit points for both our 1 year old and 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: MinnesotaMiss

customer_reviews.title: Great for Toddlers and Crawlers
customer_reviews.text: Really cute house. A little difficult to screw together. But the design is great. We love it for Toddlers and it has openings that crawlers can get through too!
customer_reviews.author: MissDee215

customer_reviews.title: Get a good screwdriver and a helper
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to assemble with dizzying instructions...it took two adults to assemble. Pain in the a-- as we even had to put down our beers....
customer_reviews.author: Buckyboy

customer_reviews.title: Missing Decals
customer_reviews.text: Other than that, it was nice and easy to put together. I bought a cheep battery operated doorbell and stuck on the front of it. Girls love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect indoor play space!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this playhouse inside for my almost-walker. The height is perfect to support a standing baby and allows for cruising around. Large toys can be housed within it. Added bonus: the door keeps the kiddo occupied, and away from the China cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: amazon junkie

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: We got thefor our two girls (aged 4 and 1) and they absolutely love "getting the mail" in the mail slot and "preparing dinner" at the sink. The instructions were clear and easy to follow, and the playhouse took about 2 hours to assemble. It would have been faster but the kids were so excited to start playing with it that I had to keep stopping to show them the house while it was under construction. We've had the playhouse for a couple weeks now and I'm really glad we bought it. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Mes

customer_reviews.title: Durable and stud d y
customer_reviews.text: This is well built and easy to put together. I did it by myself and if took about 30 minutes. My two year old grand daughter loves it and I'm sure it is durable enough for the newborn to play in it two years from now!
customer_reviews.author: susan dirks

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons love it! I am 58 year old woman and put it together by myself with electric drill. Arrived in 2 days! Very cute and as described, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L. Hein

customer_reviews.title: Great for a toddler.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter for our backyard and she loves it. It didn’t come with any of the stickers it was supposed to have though which is a little annoying. But it’s not a huge issue I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Tarynr92

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build and clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean! Our daughter loves her little house. The stickers have peeled but we live in Florida in the humidity, so perfectly normal.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Nas

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but electric screwdriver is a must.
customer_reviews.text: Wife assembled it, Kids loved it, Would have liked clearer screw holes, but an electric screwdriver did the trick, Real cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to do.
customer_reviews.text: It took me 3in-half hours to assemble the playhouse. I had to make my own holes to screw in each connection🤔 I was not happy🧐
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little play house for my son, he loves it and so do my dogs, they are always outside cooling off in the house!!
customer_reviews.author: macie

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a couple small ones to play in! Useful indoors during winter too!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Bly

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy 1 man assembly main thing is 2 year old granddaughter loves it. Smaller than it looks on pictures great addition is a small stool and table
customer_reviews.author: Hectoris

customer_reviews.title: Cute backyard house
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for a friend’s twins. They absolutely love it. When they go in the back yard it is the first thing they run to play.
customer_reviews.author: Rwolfelover

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Simple Kids PlayHouse
customer_reviews.text: Simple house, my two little boys like it. Easy to build, was able to do it without any help from my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice play house
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my puppy play yard. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S

customer_reviews.title: Unsteady
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks the kids love it only problem is it's not as sturdy as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff. Our two-year old goddaughter Eleanor loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My sister said it did not come with the decals in the pictures. Would you have them?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old grandson. It is open enough to stay cooler in our Southern climate. He loves the mail slot! His baby brother can crawl in and out through the lower opening. Great Birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope M. Nobles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little house!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this product. It was easy to put together and easily fits indoors or outdoors. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together and so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! I have a 5, 3, and 1 yr old and they ply in the playhouse all day everyday. Never gets old to them
customer_reviews.author: Nafeezah

customer_reviews.title: Great fun awaits
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kiddos. Easy to put together. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Great little house... only needed a 2nd adult to assemble the rough which I still need to do....
customer_reviews.author: ESL

customer_reviews.title: Missing some things :/
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Nice and stable only thing is the stickers were missing, to the little “outside light” and everything else :/
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Marquez

customer_reviews.title: OUR GRANDSON LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, very sturdy. Our 2 yr old grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect birthday gift.
customer_reviews.text: A new place to play for my 3yo grandson. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: The smile of a child is priceless
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my granddaughter and she won't leave it alone she LOVES it
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS HUTCHISON

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter got an early birthday present. She loved it! The sink and the mail slot are her favorite features.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Young

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandkids they seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Loraine Dennison

customer_reviews.title: If you build it, my child my come a few times to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to build if you buy a 6 pack and put on music.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McGee

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived with no instructions and multiple pieces missing. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J. Christian

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it & it is fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Playhouse fun
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter loves her playhouse. She gets such enjoyment out of it. We are so pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Collins

customer_reviews.title: Predrill the screw holes first makes it easier.
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the product. It’s perfect for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: easy set up. great quality. My kids have had hours and hours of fun in this playhouse. Comfortably fits 2 small kids inside playing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Liner

customer_reviews.title: The seaside villa is a charming playhouse!
customer_reviews.text: Put this playhouse together in about 30 minutes. Well made, easy to follow directions . Kids will love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: iamhotdog

customer_reviews.title: I have a 1 and 4 year old and they both love to play in it
customer_reviews.text: This has been a huge hit with my kids. I have a 1 and 4 year old and they both love to play in it. When the box arrived they couldn't wait to play so we assembled it inside. It took my husband less than an hour and is very sturdy. It currently is in our play room and I love the color scheme. I was going to put it outside but may just keep inside because they enjoy it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Wells

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little house! My four year old can fit in it comfortably and she enjoys it a lot. It is very sturdy and the colors are spot on. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rule

product_meta.title: Step2 893199 Seaside Villa Playhouse Kids
product_meta.description: Little ones will have the perfect coastal home to play the day away with this outdoor playhouse. Toddlers can relax on the molded-in front porch bench to socialize with friends, and check the mail with the pass-through mail slot. When social hour is over, head inside the playhouse through the working Dutch-style door to prepare a snack with the built-in kitchenette set. Kids will enjoy hours of engaging social play and fresh air as they pretend to hear the ocean waves in their own coastal home. Made in the USA of US and imported parts.
feature_bullets: Your child’s Step2 Seaside Villa Playhouse is a great place to host a pretend dinner party on the coast!
Little ones can take care of their own home just like their adult role models do with activities like checking the mail and pretending to cook!
The working Dutch-style door allows kids to easily come and go, and the open outdoor playhouse design makes it easy for adults to keep an eye on playtime.
The charming design of this playhouse for toddlers includes realistic stacked stone, molded-in roof details, and coastal-cool color palette.
In the box: Playhouse with decals.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars187 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
